description: Agent1 Conversational Test Examples - Tests for intent classification with memory and cache integration

test_scenarios.name: Complete Conversation Flow Test
test_scenarios.description: Tests all Agent1 intents: NEW_DATA_QUERY, FOLLOWUP_QUESTION, GENERAL_QUESTION, MODIFIED_QUERY with memory integration

steps.query: Show me all clients in the database
steps.description: Fresh query with no cache or memory - should generate SQL and store in cache

steps.query: How many of them have a high risk profile?
steps.description: Follow-up question about cached results - should answer from cache without SQL

steps.query: What is a risk profile in wealth management?
steps.description: General knowledge question - should answer directly without SQL, cache should remain intact

steps.query: What is the total AUM across all the clients shown?
steps.description: Another follow-up question - cache should still work after general question

steps.query: What queries have I asked so far about clients?
steps.description: Tests short-term memory recall - should reference previous conversations

steps.query: Show me all portfolios and their base currencies
steps.description: New unrelated query - should clear old cache and create new SQL

steps.query: Now filter those to show only USD portfolios
steps.description: Modified query - should build on previous query with filter

steps.query: How many USD portfolios are there?
steps.description: Follow-up to modified query results - should use updated cache

steps.query: Can you explain more about risk profiles? What are the different types?
steps.description: Follow-up general question - should use memory to provide contextual answer related to step 3

test_scenarios.name: Memory-Only Modified Query Test
test_scenarios.description: Tests modified query detection using memory when cache is cleared

steps.query: Show me all transactions from the last month
steps.description: Initial query to establish memory context

steps.query: Show me all assets
steps.description: New query that clears the cache from step 1

steps.query: Go back to the transactions and filter by BUY type only
steps.description: Modified query referencing step 1 via memory (not cache) - should detect modification from conversation history

test_scenarios.name: General Question Memory Chain
test_scenarios.description: Tests that general questions are properly classified with and without cache, and memory links them

steps.query: What is DuckDB and how is it different from PostgreSQL?
steps.description: General knowledge question with no context

steps.query: Show me the top 5 holdings by quantity
steps.description: Data query to establish cache

steps.query: What are holdings in a portfolio?
steps.description: General question WHILE cache exists - cache should NOT be cleared

steps.query: What is the largest holding shown?
steps.description: Verify cache still works after general question

steps.query: Earlier you explained DuckDB. Can you give me an example SQL query that would work in DuckDB?
steps.description: General question referencing earlier general question via memory

test_scenarios.name: Edge Case Tests
test_scenarios.description: Tests edge cases in intent classification

steps.query: Tell me about clients
steps.description: Ambiguous query that could be general or data - should default to data query when schema matches

steps.query: Show me their portfolios
steps.description: Query with pronoun referencing previous context

steps.query: From the results above, which client has the most portfolios?
steps.description: Explicit reference to previous results

steps.query: What is portfolio diversification and show me portfolios with more than 3 assets
steps.description: Query mixing general question with data request - should prioritize data query

test_scenarios.name: Different Modification Types
test_scenarios.description: Tests various types of query modifications

steps.query: Show me all clients with their names and risk profiles
steps.description: Base query to modify

steps.query: Filter to show only high risk clients
steps.description: Filter modification

steps.query: Sort those results by client name alphabetically
steps.description: Sort modification

steps.query: Also include their email addresses
steps.description: Add columns modification

steps.query: Now group by risk profile and count them
steps.description: Aggregation modification

scenario_2_no_cache_has_memory.note: MODIFIED_QUERY possible if memory contains relevant previous query

test_instructions.how_to_run: Execute each step in sequence within a scenario. After each step, verify the expected_intent and expected_behavior match the actual Agent1 output.
test_instructions.cache_verification: Check query_cache.has_cache() and query_cache.get_cached_query() to verify cache state
test_instructions.intent_verification: Check Agent1 trace output for 'intent' field in details
